quest.name: Hells-vent on the Heavens
journal:
 Quest Sync
Tazel Meyean the Lettered would turn to you for your crafting expertise.
※The crafting portion of this quest is recommended for Disciples of the Hand level 10 and above, and the battle portion for Disciples of War or Magic level 47 and above.

Tazel Meyean the Lettered has asked you to craft four high-quality components for his revolutionary heat vent unit. Doing so requires that you have access to Gerolt's forge in Hyrstmill. By way of payment for using the facility, the Ixali inventor bids you obtain three pieces of plate worn by the dullahans that prowl Proud Creek.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
You have obtained three pieces of dullahan plate. Make your way to Hyrstmill and offer them to Drake, Gerolt's apprentice.

Satisfied with the dullahan plate you have brought, Drake grants you unlimited access to his master's crafting facility. With the materials he has supplied, synthesize four high-quality heat vent components, and deliver them to Tazel Meyean at Ehcatl.

※In the event that the status Facility Access: Detailing wears off or the synthesis ends in failure, you may try again by speaking with Drake.

You have delivered the heat vent components to Tazel Meyean, who squawks in sheer delight. The Ixal is most impressed by your flawless craftsmanship, and expresses his excitement at the prospect of flying free like the wind with his brethren.
objectives: Obtain pieces of dullahan plate from dullahans at Proud Creek.
Deliver the dullahan plate to Drake at Hyrstmill.
Synthesize heat vent components Deliver the heat vent components to Tazel Meyean the Lettered.

dialogue.name: TAZELMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Squawk! Almost complete, my revolutionary heat vent unit is. Four components of highest quality, I need.

dialogue.name: TAZELMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Pipes for passing fiery-hot air, they are. Strong and resistant to heat. Craft components at Hyrstmill, you must.

dialogue.name: TAZELMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Rubber lining for pipes, it is. Strong and resistant to heat. Craft components at Hyrstmill, you must.

dialogue.name: TAZELMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Composite material for casing, it is. Strong and resistant to heat. Craft components at Hyrstmill, you must.

dialogue.name: TAZELMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Featherless one Tataramu says, at hamlet is weaponsmith of great skill. Suitable crafting facility and abundant materials, he has.

dialogue.name: TAZELMEYEAN
dialogue.text: With his fledgling, name of Drake, you must speak─get permission to use facility and materials. As payment, bring him dullahan plate. Maybe three pieces. Get them from fiends around Proud Creek, you can.

dialogue.name: TAZELMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Working on revolutionary heat vent unit, I am. Four components of highest quality, I need. Craft components at Hyrstmill, you must.

dialogue.name: DRAKE
dialogue.text:
Greetings, good madamsir. Are you here to collect your kettle?
...Begging your pardon? You wish to use our facility? I-I'm afraid I must consult my master...

dialogue.name: DRAKE
dialogue.text: You would give us these pieces of plate as payment? Gods know we can't have too much good steel for our kettles. Master Gerolt shall have no cause to complain, I should think.

dialogue.name: DRAKE
dialogue.text: Our humble facility is at your disposal, and likewise the supplies you say you need. The steel you brought more than covers the costs.

dialogue.name: DRAKE
dialogue.text: If you have need of additional materials, do not hesitate to ask me. The steel you brought is of excellent quality and more than covers the costs.

dialogue.name: DRAKE
dialogue.text: You have finished your work, madamsir? I assume that you will be on your way. Should you later find that you still have need of our facility and supplies, know that both are at your disposal.

dialogue.name: TAZELMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Welcome here, featherless one is. Four high-quality components for heat vent unit, you have made? Then quickly show Tazel, you must.

dialogue.name: TAZELMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Squawk! Nothing to be desired, workmanship leaves! Most impressed, I am! Fly free like wind, soon Ehcatl Nine will!

dialogue.name: POPMESSAGE
dialogue.text: You now have access to the crafting facility.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
